snippet: Martin Sorrell, chief executive of the British advertising giant WPP, says he sees growth prospects in Latin America. The firm has taken a 20 percent stake in an information technology services company based in Argentina.

headline.main: Seeing Opportunity, WPP Adds to Its Investments in Latin America
